title: AI and the Talent Challenge: Why Europe Needs More Professional Accountants
summary_full: Europe’s competitiveness depends on a strong pipeline of professional accountants, yet the demand for skills in areas such as sustainability reporting, green finance, cyber‑crime and AI is growing faster than the supply of qualified professionals. ACCA is launching a Europe‐wide conversation on how to attract, develop and retain the accounting talent our economies urgently need. Learn more […]
